title: Codex PrepareForLaunch with -c OTEL config
description: CodexAdapter.PrepareForLaunch generates -c flag for OTEL trace exporter config: -c 'otel.trace_exporter={type="otlp-http",endpoint="http://127.0.0.1:PORT"}'. Verify exact TOML syntax works with Codex CLI. Auth credentials in CODEX_HOME/.credentials.json are unaffected.
